# isInBillingRetryPeriod

**Type**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the App Store is attempting to automatically renew an expired subscription.

## Declaration

```swift
boolean isInBillingRetryPeriod
```

## Billing status

- **gracePeriodExpiresDate**: The time when the Billing Grace Period for subscription renewals expires.
